title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.67 - Removal of vehicles from terminal to be at owner's or operator's risk and expense
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.67 - Removal of vehicles from terminal to be at owner's or operator's risk and expense

State Regulations

In the event the Port Authority is empowered to remove
any bus or other vehicle from the terminal by any provision of the rules and
regulations set forth in this Part, such removal shall be at the risk of the
owner or operator of such vehicle, and the cost thereof shall be for the
account of such owner or operator and payable to the Port Authority on
demand. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.67

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
